Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am a financial expert. I will ask some questions to collect information related to the spending of a political party and then I will use the information to advise the spending information for the next election.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a detailed note on how the political party should spend its money in the next election based on the next election without getting into debt.

QApair.Question: Question:How much money did the political party spend on advertising during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $10.5 million on advertising during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party spend on campaign workers during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $24.5 million on campaign workers during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party spend on travel during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $5.1 million on travel during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party spend on fundraising during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $2.3 million on fundraising during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party spend on office expenses during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $9.2 million on office expenses during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party spend on other expenses during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $1 million on other expenses during the last election.

QApair.Question: What was the total amount of money spent by the political party during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party spent $52 million during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much money did the political party raise during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party raised $72 million during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much debt did the political party incur during the last election?
QApair.Answer: The political party incurred $2 million in debt during the last election.

QApair.Question: How much cash on hand does the political party have?
QApair.Answer: The political party has $14 million in cash on hand.

QApair.Question: What is the total amount of money the political party has available to spend on the next election?
QApair.Answer: The political party has $90 million available to spend on the next election.

Instances.Output: The political party should spend its money in the next election based on the following: -Advertising: The party should spend $7 million on advertising. This will allow the party to reach more voters and get its message out. -Campaign workers: The party should spend $22 million on campaign workers. This will ensure that the party has a strong ground game and can reach voters where they are. -Travel: The party should spend $4 million on travel. This will allow the party to reach more voters in different parts of the country. -Fundraising: The party should spend $3 million on fundraising. This will allow the party to raise more money and ensure that it has the resources it needs to win.
